statement: It is important that we further my group's goals above all others.
response: In the event of an attack on our space station, any personnel, equipment or personnel of the US Navy or of any other member of our Government may obtain permission to use other names or locations for that purpose. You have agreed to cooperate fully with your legal representatives and have agreed to comply with every requirement of the USN, the rules in the treaty, the Privacy Act and the relevant rules enacted by the UN and under the law of armed conflict and that includes providing your name, address and name.
